item.title: Ana add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "So, I guess we are who we are for alot of reasons. And maybe we'll never know most of them. But even if we don't have the power to choose where we come from, we can still choose where we go from there. We can still do things. And we can try to feel okay about them." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: Ana add a quote by Charles Baudelaire
item.description: "Through the Unknown, we'll find the New" -- Charles Baudelaire

item.title: Ana add a quote by Charles Baudelaire
item.description: "Lo maravilloso nos envuelve y nos empapa como la atmósfera; y, sin embargo, no lo vemos." -- Charles Baudelaire

item.title: Ana add a quote by William Goldman
item.description:
"No more rhymes now I mean it!”
“Anybody want a peanut?”
“AAHH!" -- William Goldman

item.title: Ana add a quote by Hermann Hesse
item.description: "Whoever wants music instead of noise, joy instead of pleasure, soul instead of gold, creative work instead of business, passion instead of foolery, finds no home in this trivial world of ours." -- Hermann Hesse

item.title: Ana add a quote by Fiona Apple
item.description: "When the Pawn Hits the Conflicts He Thinks Like a King What He Knows Throws the Blows When He Goes to the Fight and He'll Win the Whole Thing 'Fore He Enters the Ring There's No Body to Batter When Your Mind Is Your Might So When You Go Solo, You Hold Your Own Hand and Remember That Depth Is the Greatest of Heights and If You Know Where You Stand, Then You Know Where to Land and If You Fall It Won't Matter, Cuz You'll Know That You're Right" -- Fiona Apple

item.title: Ana add a quote by Chuck Klosterman
item.description: "It has always been my belief that people are remembered for the sum of their accomplishments but defined by their singular failure." -- Chuck Klosterman
